scripts.compile: npx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration && npx tsup && cat ./package.json | jq -c | tee ./package.json

name: binary-utility-functions
description: This library provides a handy set of utility functions for manipulating binary values- such as those ascertained from a Buffer, or a TCP stream. These functions can be split into two categories:  1) Type validity checking  2) Type conversion
author: Lewis Farnworth
